verses.verse: The beginning <WG746> of the gospel <WG2098> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>;

And <WG2532> they were astonished <WG1605> <WG5712> at <WG1909> his <WG846> doctrine <WG1322>: for <WG1063> he taught <WG1321> <WG5723> <WG2258> <WG5713> them <WG846> as <WG5613> one that had <WG2192> <WG5723> authority <WG1849>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> as <WG5613> the scribes <WG1122>.
